Dependencies¶

Python version¶

urlwatch requires Python 3.6 or higher to run.

Mandatory Packages¶

If urlwatch is installed with pip, these Python packages are installed automatically:

  • appdirs

  • html2text

  • lxml

  • markdown2

  • minidb

  • PyYAML

  • requests

  • colorama (for Windows installations)

Optional Packages¶

Certain features require additional Python packages to work. These optional packages can be installed using:

python3 -m pip install <packagename> # or, to install to $HOME python3 -m pip install <packagename> –user

Where <packagename> is one of the following:

Feature

Python package(s) to install

url job with use _browser: true

  • pyppeteer and its OS-specific dependencies (1)

beautify filter

  • beautifulsoup4

  • jsbeautifier (2)

  • cssbeautifier (3)

pdf2text filter

  • pdftotext

  • its OS-specific dependencies (see the above link)

ocr filter

  • pytesseract

  • Pillow

pushover reporter

  • chump

pushbullet reporter

  • pushbullet.py

matrix reporter

  • matrix_client

xmpp reporter

  • aioxmpp

Developers:

  • flake8

  • flake8-import-order

  • `pytest <https://docs.pytest.org/en/latest/`__

  • docutils

  • job, filter and reporter dependencies as needed (see above)

(1) pypetteer’s OS-specific dependencies are listed here. A missing dependency is often the cause of the error pyppeteer.errors.BrowserError: Browser closed unexpectedly.

(2) Optional, to beautify content of <script> tags

(3) Optional, to beautify content of <style> tags
